data.title: Postharvest Disease Management
data.meta_description: Pre- and postharvest disease control for ornamental plants is mainly provided via fungicide or bactericide application. However, disease control with conventional chemical compounds carries the risk of resistance development by new pathogen races. Additionally, there...
